<S>1161</S> There was<S>2258</S> a certain<S>5100</S> man<S>435</S> in<S>1722</S> Caesarea<S>2542</S> called<S>3686</S> Cornelius<S>2883</S>, a centurion<S>1543</S> of<S>1537</S> the band<S>4686</S> called<S>2564</S> the Italian<S>2483</S> band,
A devout<S>2152</S> man, and<S>2532</S> one that feared<S>5399</S> God<S>2316</S> with<S>4862</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>, which<S>5037</S> gave<S>4160</S> much<S>4183</S> alms<S>1654</S> to the people<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> prayed<S>1189</S> to God<S>2316</S> alway<S>1275</S>.
He saw<S>1492</S> in<S>1722</S> a vision<S>3705</S> evidently<S>5320</S> about<S>5616</S> the ninth<S>1766</S> hour<S>5610</S> of the day<S>2250</S> an angel<S>32</S> of God<S>2316</S> coming in<S>1525</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Cornelius<S>2883</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when he looked<S>816</S> on him<S>846</S>, he was<S>1096</S> afraid<S>1719</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, What<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>? And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thy<S>4675</S> prayers<S>4335</S> and<S>2532</S> thine<S>4675</S> alms<S>1654</S> are come up<S>305</S> for<S>1519</S> a memorial<S>3422</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> send<S>3992</S> men<S>435</S> to<S>1519</S> Joppa<S>2445</S>, and<S>2532</S> call for<S>3343</S> one Simon<S>4613</S>, whose<S>3739</S> surname is<S>1941</S> Peter<S>4074</S>:
He<S>3778</S> lodgeth<S>3579</S> with<S>3844</S> one<S>5100</S> Simon<S>4613</S> a tanner<S>1038</S>, whose<S>3739</S> house<S>3614</S> is<S>2076</S> by<S>3844</S> the sea side<S>2281</S>: he<S>3778</S> shall tell<S>2980</S> thee<S>4671</S> what<S>5101</S> thou<S>4571</S> oughtest<S>1163</S> to do<S>4160</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> the angel<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> spake<S>2980</S> unto Cornelius<S>2883</S> was departed<S>565</S>, he called<S>5455</S> two<S>1417</S> of his<S>846</S> household servants<S>3610</S>, and<S>2532</S> a devout<S>2152</S> soldier<S>4757</S> of them that waited on<S>4342</S> him<S>846</S> continually<S>4342</S>;
And<S>2532</S> when he had declared<S>1834</S> all these things<S>537</S> unto them<S>846</S>, he sent<S>649</S> them<S>846</S> to<S>1519</S> Joppa<S>2445</S>.
<S>1161</S> On the morrow<S>1887</S>, as they<S>1565</S> went on their journey<S>3596</S>, and<S>2532</S> drew nigh<S>1448</S> unto the city<S>4172</S>, Peter<S>4074</S> went up<S>305</S> upon<S>1909</S> the housetop<S>1430</S> to pray<S>4336</S> about<S>4012</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> hour<S>5610</S>:
And<S>1161</S> he became<S>1096</S> very hungry<S>4361</S>, and<S>2532</S> would<S>2309</S> have eaten<S>1089</S>: but<S>1161</S> while they<S>1565</S> made ready<S>3903</S>, he<S>846</S> fell<S>1968</S> into<S>1909</S> a trance<S>1611</S>,
And<S>2532</S> saw<S>2334</S> heaven<S>3772</S> opened<S>455</S>, and<S>2532</S> a certain<S>5100</S> vessel<S>4632</S> descending<S>2597</S> unto<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>, as<S>5613</S> it had been a great<S>3173</S> sheet<S>3607</S> knit<S>1210</S> at the four<S>5064</S> corners<S>746</S>, and<S>2532</S> let down<S>2524</S> to<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>:
Wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> were<S>5225</S> all manner<S>3956</S> of fourfooted beasts<S>5074</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> wild beasts<S>2342</S>, and<S>2532</S> creeping things<S>2062</S>, and<S>2532</S> fowls<S>4071</S> of the air<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there came<S>1096</S> a voice<S>5456</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Rise<S>450</S>, Peter<S>4074</S>; kill<S>2380</S>, and<S>2532</S> eat<S>5315</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>2036</S>, Not so<S>3365</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>; for<S>3754</S> I have<S>5315</S> never<S>3763</S> eaten<S>5315</S> any thing<S>3956</S> that is common<S>2839</S> or<S>2228</S> unclean<S>169</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the voice<S>5456</S> spake unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S> <S>1537</S> the second time<S>1208</S>, What<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath cleansed<S>2511</S>, that call<S>2840</S> not<S>3361</S> thou<S>4771</S> common<S>2840</S>.
<S>1161</S> This<S>5124</S> was done<S>1096</S> thrice<S>1909</S> <S>5151</S>: and<S>2532</S> the vessel<S>4632</S> was received up<S>353</S> again<S>3825</S> into<S>1519</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> while<S>5613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> doubted<S>1280</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S> what<S>5101</S> this vision<S>3705</S> which<S>3739</S> he had seen<S>1492</S> should mean<S>302</S> <S>1498</S>, behold<S>2400</S> <S>2532</S>, the men<S>435</S> which<S>3588</S> were sent<S>649</S> from<S>575</S> Cornelius<S>2883</S> had made enquiry<S>1331</S> for Simon's<S>4613</S> house<S>3614</S>, and stood<S>2186</S> before<S>1909</S> the gate<S>4440</S>,
And<S>2532</S> called<S>5455</S>, and asked<S>4441</S> whether<S>1487</S> Simon<S>4613</S>, which<S>3588</S> was surnamed<S>1941</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, were lodged<S>3579</S> there<S>1759</S>.
While<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> thought<S>1760</S> on<S>4012</S> the vision<S>3705</S>, the Spirit<S>4151</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, three<S>5140</S> men<S>435</S> seek<S>2212</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
Arise<S>450</S> therefore<S>235</S>, and get thee down<S>2597</S>, and<S>2532</S> go<S>4198</S> with<S>4862</S> them<S>846</S>, doubting<S>1252</S> nothing<S>3367</S>: for<S>1360</S> I<S>1473</S> have sent<S>649</S> them<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> went down<S>2597</S> to<S>4314</S> the men<S>435</S> which<S>3588</S> were sent<S>649</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> from<S>575</S> Cornelius<S>2883</S>; and said<S>2036</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he whom<S>3739</S> ye seek<S>2212</S>: what<S>5101</S> is the cause<S>156</S> wherefore<S>1223</S> <S>3739</S> ye are come<S>3918</S>?
And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S>, Cornelius<S>2883</S> the centurion<S>1543</S>, a just<S>1342</S> man<S>435</S>, and<S>2532</S> one that feareth<S>5399</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>5037</S> of good report<S>3140</S> among<S>5259</S> all<S>3650</S> the nation<S>1484</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>, was warned from God<S>5537</S> by<S>5259</S> an holy<S>40</S> angel<S>32</S> to send<S>3343</S> for thee<S>4571</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>, and<S>2532</S> to hear<S>191</S> words<S>4487</S> of<S>3844</S> thee<S>4675</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> called he<S>1528</S> them<S>846</S> in<S>1528</S>, and lodged<S>3579</S> them. And<S>1161</S> on the morrow<S>1887</S> Peter<S>4074</S> went away<S>1831</S> with<S>4862</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> certain<S>5100</S> brethren<S>80</S> from<S>575</S> Joppa<S>2445</S> accompanied<S>4905</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the morrow<S>1887</S> after they entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> Caesarea<S>2542</S>. And<S>1161</S> Cornelius<S>2883</S> waited for<S>4328</S> them<S>846</S> <S>2258</S>, and had called together<S>4779</S> his<S>846</S> kinsmen<S>4773</S> and<S>2532</S> near<S>316</S> friends<S>5384</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as<S>5613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> was<S>1096</S> coming in<S>1525</S>, Cornelius<S>2883</S> met<S>4876</S> him<S>846</S>, and fell down<S>4098</S> at<S>1909</S> his feet<S>4228</S>, and worshipped<S>4352</S> him.
But<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> took<S>1453</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Stand up<S>450</S>; I<S>2504</S> myself<S>846</S> also<S>2504</S> am<S>1510</S> a man<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as he talked<S>4926</S> with him<S>846</S>, he went in<S>1525</S>, and<S>2532</S> found<S>2147</S> many<S>4183</S> that were come together<S>4905</S>.
And<S>5037</S> he said<S>5346</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, Ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1987</S> how<S>5613</S> that it is<S>2076</S> an unlawful thing<S>111</S> for a man<S>435</S> that is a Jew<S>2453</S> to keep company<S>2853</S>, or<S>2228</S> come unto<S>4334</S> one of another nation<S>246</S>; but<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> hath shewed<S>1166</S> me<S>1698</S> that I should not<S>3367</S> call<S>3004</S> any<S>3367</S> man<S>444</S> common<S>2839</S> or<S>2228</S> unclean<S>169</S>.
Therefore<S>1352</S> <S>2532</S> came I<S>2064</S> unto you without gainsaying<S>369</S>, as soon as I was sent for<S>3343</S>: I ask<S>4441</S> therefore<S>3767</S> for what<S>5101</S> intent<S>3056</S> ye have sent for<S>3343</S> me<S>3165</S>?
And<S>2532</S> Cornelius<S>2883</S> said<S>5346</S>, Four<S>5067</S> days<S>2250</S> ago<S>575</S> I was<S>2252</S> fasting<S>3522</S> until<S>3360</S> this<S>5026</S> hour<S>5610</S>; and<S>2532</S> at the ninth<S>1766</S> hour<S>5610</S> I prayed<S>4336</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> house<S>3624</S>, and<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, a man<S>435</S> stood<S>2476</S> before<S>1799</S> me<S>3450</S> in<S>1722</S> bright<S>2986</S> clothing<S>2066</S>,
And<S>2532</S> said<S>5346</S>, Cornelius<S>2883</S>, thy<S>4675</S> prayer<S>4335</S> is heard<S>1522</S>, and<S>2532</S> thine<S>4675</S> alms<S>1654</S> are had in remembrance<S>3415</S> in the sight<S>1799</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Send<S>3992</S> therefore<S>3767</S> to<S>1519</S> Joppa<S>2445</S>, and<S>2532</S> call hither<S>3333</S> Simon<S>4613</S>, whose<S>3739</S> surname is<S>1941</S> Peter<S>4074</S>; he<S>3778</S> is lodged<S>3579</S> in<S>1722</S> the house<S>3614</S> of one Simon<S>4613</S> a tanner<S>1038</S> by<S>3844</S> the sea side<S>2281</S>: who<S>3739</S>, when he cometh<S>3854</S>, shall speak<S>2980</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>.
Immediately<S>1824</S> therefore<S>3767</S> I sent<S>3992</S> to<S>4314</S> thee<S>4571</S>; and<S>5037</S> thou<S>4771</S> hast well<S>2573</S> done<S>4160</S> that thou art come<S>3854</S>. Now<S>3568</S> therefore<S>3767</S> are<S>3918</S> we<S>2249</S> all<S>3956</S> here present<S>3918</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>, to hear<S>191</S> all things<S>3956</S> that are commanded<S>4367</S> thee<S>4671</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> opened<S>455</S> his mouth<S>4750</S>, and said<S>2036</S>, Of<S>1909</S> a truth<S>225</S> I perceive<S>2638</S> that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> respecter of persons<S>4381</S>:
But<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> nation<S>1484</S> he that feareth<S>5399</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> worketh<S>2038</S> righteousness<S>1343</S>, is<S>2076</S> accepted<S>1184</S> with him<S>846</S>.
The word<S>3056</S> which<S>3739</S> God sent<S>649</S> unto the children<S>5207</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>, preaching<S>2097</S> peace<S>1515</S> by<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: (he<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> Lord<S>2962</S> of all<S>3956</S>:)
That word<S>4487</S>, I say, ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1492</S>, which was published<S>1096</S> throughout<S>2596</S> all<S>3650</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>, and began<S>756</S> from<S>575</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, after<S>3326</S> the baptism<S>908</S> which<S>3739</S> John<S>2491</S> preached<S>2784</S>;
How<S>5613</S> God<S>2316</S> anointed<S>5548</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> of<S>575</S> Nazareth<S>3478</S> with the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> with power<S>1411</S>: who<S>846</S> <S>3739</S> went about<S>1330</S> doing good<S>2109</S>, and<S>2532</S> healing<S>2390</S> all<S>3956</S> that were oppressed<S>2616</S> of<S>5259</S> the devil<S>1228</S>; for<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> we<S>2249</S> are<S>2070</S> witnesses<S>3144</S> of all things<S>3956</S> which<S>3739</S> he did<S>4160</S> both<S>5037</S> in<S>1722</S> the land<S>5561</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>; whom<S>3739</S> they slew<S>337</S> and hanged<S>2910</S> on<S>1909</S> a tree<S>3586</S>:
Him<S>5126</S> God<S>2316</S> raised up<S>1453</S> the third<S>5154</S> day<S>2250</S>, and<S>2532</S> shewed<S>1096</S> him<S>846</S> openly<S>1717</S> <S>1325</S>;
Not<S>3756</S> to all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S>, but<S>235</S> unto witnesses<S>3144</S> chosen before<S>4401</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S>, even to us<S>2254</S>, who<S>3748</S> did eat<S>4906</S> and<S>2532</S> drink with<S>4844</S> him<S>846</S> after<S>3326</S> he<S>846</S> rose<S>450</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he commanded<S>3853</S> us<S>2254</S> to preach<S>2784</S> unto the people<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> to testify<S>1263</S> that<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> he<S>846</S> which<S>3588</S> was ordained<S>3724</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S> to be the Judge<S>2923</S> of quick<S>2198</S> and<S>2532</S> dead<S>3498</S>.
To him<S>5129</S> give<S>3140</S> all<S>3956</S> the prophets<S>4396</S> witness<S>3140</S>, that through<S>1223</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> believeth<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> shall receive<S>2983</S> remission<S>859</S> of sins<S>266</S>.
While Peter<S>4074</S> yet<S>2089</S> spake<S>2980</S> these<S>5023</S> words<S>4487</S>, the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> fell<S>1968</S> on<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> them which heard<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they of<S>1537</S> the circumcision<S>4061</S> which believed<S>4103</S> were astonished<S>1839</S>, as many as<S>3745</S> came with<S>4905</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, because<S>3754</S> that on<S>1909</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> also<S>2532</S> was poured out<S>1632</S> the gift<S>1431</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
For<S>1063</S> they heard<S>191</S> them<S>846</S> speak with<S>2980</S> tongues<S>1100</S>, and<S>2532</S> magnify<S>3170</S> God<S>2316</S>. Then<S>5119</S> answered<S>611</S> Peter<S>4074</S>,
Can<S>3385</S> <S>1410</S> any man<S>5100</S> forbid<S>2967</S> water<S>5204</S>, that these<S>5128</S> should<S>907</S> not<S>3361</S> be baptized<S>907</S>, which<S>3748</S> have received<S>2983</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> as<S>2532</S> well as<S>2531</S> we<S>2249</S>?
And<S>5037</S> he commanded<S>4367</S> them<S>846</S> to be baptized<S>907</S> in<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>. Then<S>5119</S> prayed they<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S> to tarry<S>1961</S> certain<S>5100</S> days<S>2250</S>.
